definitions.definition: to not succeed in what you are trying to achieve or are expected to do:
examples: She moved to London in the hope of finding work as a model, but failed.

definitions.definition: if none of our plans succeed:
examples: If all else fails, we can always stay in and watch TV.

definitions.definition: an unsuccessful result in a course, test, or exam:
examples: John got three passes and four fails in his exams.

definitions.definition: something that has been done very badly or gone completely wrong; a failure:
examples: My pancakes were an epic fail (= completely unsuccessful).
